const response = await client.indices.create({
  index: "range_index",
  settings: {
    number_of_shards: 2,
  },
  mappings: {
    properties: {
      expected_attendees: {
        type: "integer_range",
      },
      time_frame: {
        type: "date_range",
        format: "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss||yyyy-MM-dd||epoch_millis",
      },
    },
  },
});
console.log(response);

const response1 = await client.index({
  index: "range_index",
  id: 1,
  refresh: "true",
  document: {
    expected_attendees: {
      gte: 10,
      lt: 20,
    },
    time_frame: {
      gte: "2015-10-31 12:00:00",
      lte: "2015-11-01",
    },
  },
});
console.log(response1);
